column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I ordered the shrimp with garlic
column2: olive oil and red pepper flakes thrice. I didn't like the beef empanadas
column3: it lacked taste. The seared lamb loin was really good
column4: enjoyed the pisto manchengo that came with it. The ambience of the restaurant was really fun and inviting. Overall good place for the price. I ate a lot but it was worth it.
